name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Escape the Algorithm - Social Feed Blocker

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide distracting feeds and suggested content on YouTube, Twitter, Facebook and more to unhook your brain from social media addiction
